Package controller

Class PrimeWindow

java.lang.Object
controller.PrimeWindow
public class PrimeWindow extends Object
Controller class for the PrimeWindow FXML. It handles UI elements and actions related to the main application window including tabs, log out, & exit.

    • checkForUpcomingAppointments

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> checkForUpcomingAppointments() throws SQLException
      Checks for upcoming appointments for the current user logs in.
      Returns:
      An observable list containing the upcoming appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while retrieving appointments from the database.
